doc.field: Two black-and-white photographic negatives depicting G. Saitta Funeral Home, circa 1950s. The funeral home was located at the corner of Central Avenue and Cornelia Street, in the Bushwick neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York. Included with the negatives are two copy prints.

Two black-and-white photographic negatives depicting G. Saitta Funeral Home, circa 1950s. The funeral home was located at the corner of Central Avenue and Cornelia Street, in the Bushwick neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York. Included with the negatives are two copy prints.

Two black-and-white photographic negatives depicting G. Saitta Funeral Home, circa 1950s. The funeral home was located at the corner of Central Avenue and Cornelia Street, in the Bushwick neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York. Included with the negatives are two copy prints.

The photographs were seemingly captured at two different times, based on changes to the building's facade. One of the images appears to document an automobile accident, while the other features a funeral procession.
